Deliver daily, weekly, and monthly reports to the CEO



? Requirements

Experience in e-commerce or dropshipping operations

Strong supplier communication skills

Highly detail-oriented and KPI-driven

Confident with Google Sheets

Able to work independently and escalate issues fast





?? Read This Carefully



This is not a passive role. You are expected to act, chase, and report — daily.

If you like ownership, structure, and accountability, apply.

If you want comfort, don’t.

title: CPA/Bookkeeper
description:
About the Role

We are looking for a detail-oriented Certified Public Accountant (CPA) who is not afraid to roll up their sleeves and handle full-cycle bookkeeping. This is not just a data-entry role; we need a financial partner who can manage our entire set of books in QuickBooks Online, handle complex journal entries, and produce accurate, high-level financial reporting every month.

If you are a CPA who excels at maintaining clean books, managing month-end closes, and generating financial insight, we want to hear from you.



Key Responsibilities



1. Full-Cycle Bookkeeping & General Ledger Management

Manage day-to-day accounting operations in QuickBooks Online (QBO).

Prepare and post standard and complex journal entries (accruals, deferrals, depreciation, etc.).Perform weekly bank and credit card reconciliations to ensure all transactions are captured accurately.

Maintain the Chart of Accounts and ensure proper classification of expenses and revenue.2. Financial Reporting & Analysis

Prepare and generate monthly financial statements, including Profit & Loss, Balance Sheet, and Cash Flow Statements.

Provide variance analysis and financial commentary on monthly results.

Ensure all reporting is GAAP/IFRS compliant (as applicable).3. Month-End & Year-End Close

Own the "Close Ends" process: Strict adherence to month-end closing timelines.

Review general ledger accounts for errors and omissions before closing the books.

Assist with year-end financial preparation and tax-ready reporting.



Requirements



Education/Certification: Must be a licensed CPA (Certified Public Accountant).Software Expertise: Advanced proficiency in QuickBooks Online is non-negotiable. You must know how to navigate QBO efficiently.

Experience: 3+ years of hands-on experience in full-cycle accounting, bookkeeping, and financial reporting.

Technical Skills: Strong understanding of debits/credits, journal entries, and accounting principles.

Soft Skills: Excellent attention to detail, strong English communication skills (written and verbal), and the ability to work independently without micromanagement.



Why Join Us?

Competitive Pay: Monthly salary of $2,000 USD

Stability: Long-term remote position with a growing business.

Autonomy: We trust you to manage the books and reporting processes.



***Very Important: Do take note that the applicant is required to share their updated CV with appropriate access. Applicants who are non compliant with this will be automatically ignored.***

title: Remote Graphic Designer / Social Media
description:
We are an Australian-based printing and apparel business seeking a part-time, remote Graphic Designer with strong CorelDRAW experience to manage customer artwork, prepare print-ready files, create mockups for approval, and design custom apparel and motorsport racewear products.

This is a client-facing role. You will communicate directly with customers using a company-provided business
 and virtual phone number, prepare visual proofs, apply revisions based on feedback, and ensure artwork is approved and ready for production.

You will also be given access to our CRM system, where artwork tasks are assigned. You’ll be required to log time spent on artwork and design tasks so clients can be billed for artwork setup or custom design work when applicable.



Artwork & Proofing Responsibilities

- Take customer-supplied artwork files and:

- Check, clean, and prepare them for printing

- Adjust sizing, colour modes, and resolution

- Create visual mockups and proofs for client approval

- Apply revisions and changes based on customer feedback

- Ensure final artwork is print-ready before production

- Maintain clear records of artwork approvals and revisions





Custom Clothing & Design Work

- Create custom designs for client requests, including:

- T-shirt prints

- Fully designed sublimated clothing packages

- Develop original or adapted artwork based on:

- Client concepts

- Reference images or rough ideas

- Prepare production-ready layouts for custom apparel orders





Advertising & Social Media (Highly Valued)

We would also highly value someone who can assist with:

- Designing creatives for Google Ads and
 Ads

- Creating social media graphics for promotions and campaigns

 (Bonus) Experience with:

- Social media posting and management

-
 Ads Manager and/or Google Ads





Required Skills & Experience

- Strong CorelDRAW experience (essential)

- Working knowledge of Adobe Illustrator & Photoshop (secondary)

- Solid understanding of print production workflows

- Experience preparing artwork for:

- Digital printing

- Sublimation printing

- Confident written and spoken English communication

- Comfortable communicating directly with customers

- Highly organised and detail-oriented

- Comfortable using CRM systems and logging time spent on tasks

- Reliable internet connection and suitable home working environment





Nice to Have (But Not Required)

- Experience in printing, apparel, or motorsport racewear

- Experience creating product mockups and upsell designs

- Paid advertising or social media management experience

- Experience working with Australian clients

title: Youtube Content Strategist
description:
About the Role



We’re looking for an experienced YouTube Content Creator & Growth Specialist who has successfully grown a YouTube channel before and understands how to turn content into real business results.

This role is not just about filming videos — it’s about strategic content creation, understanding the YouTube algorithm, and using long-form video to drive awareness, authority, and leads.

While experience in Amazon PPC / Amazon Ads or SaaS is a plus, we are primarily looking for someone who deeply understands YouTube growth mechanics and can apply them to a sales- or authority-driven business.



Key Responsibilities:



1. Content Strategy & Planning

- Develop and execute a YouTube content strategy aligned with business goals (growth, leads, authority)

- Research topics, keywords, and trends relevant to a sales-focused or B2B audience

- Build content calendars and plan for long-term channel growth



2. Content Creation

- Create engaging YouTube content (talking-head, tutorials, breakdowns, case studies, or similar)

- Craft strong hooks, titles, and video structures that maximize retention and watch time

- Collaborate on scripting or outlines when needed

- Ensure content is educational, actionable, and aligned with brand voice



3. Channel Growth & Optimization

- Optimize videos for YouTube SEO (titles, descriptions, thumbnails, tags)

- Analyze performance metrics (CTR, retention, watch time, subscribers)

- Continuously test and refine content formats, topics, and posting cadence

- Apply proven YouTube growth frameworks based on prior experience



4. Collaboration & Feedback

- Work closely with marketing, sales, or leadership teams to align content with offers

- Incorporate feedback while maintaining creative and strategic direction

- Repurpose long-form videos into short-form clips (optional but a plus)



Required Qualifications

- Proven experience growing a YouTube channel from scratch or significantly scaling an existing one

- Strong understanding of YouTube strategy, algorithm behavior, and best practices

- Experience creating YouTube content for business, education, or sales-driven audiences

- Ability to clearly explain complex topics in a simple, engaging way

- Comfortable on camera (or experienced directing on-camera talent)

- Strong storytelling, scripting, and content structuring skills

- Data-driven mindset with the ability to analyze and improve performance



*Nice to Have*

- Experience creating content around Amazon PPC / Amazon Ads

- Background in SaaS, software, B2B services, or performance marketing

- Experience turning YouTube content into leads, demos, or sales

- Familiarity with content repurposing for Shorts, Reels, or TikTok



Roles Expectation : 

- Consistent YouTube channel growth (subscribers, views, watch time).

- High-retention, high-CTR videos that attract the right audience.

- Content that drives real business outcomes (leads, demos, authority).

- A clear, repeatable content system that scales over time.



To apply :



 us at * 
 * includes:



1. Your Portfolio (must include Links to YouTube channels you’ve grown or managed & examples of videos created)

2. With
 subject line " Youtube Manager- YOUR NAME"

title: Senior Manager - E-Commerce (with leadership exp) - Remote
description:
Description

We are hiring a senior E-commerce Manager to own and manage the majority of our digital business. This role is ideal for someone with a strong small business background who is comfortable leading a lean team, managing day to day operations, and stepping into the details when needed.



This is a hands on leadership role. We are not looking for a high level executive who operates far from execution. We are looking for someone who can lead, manage, and do..



Company Brief:

We are supporting a privately owned company that distributes marine dock parts and supplies, with a strong and growing e-commerce operation in Florida. The business serves both B2B and B2C customers and relies heavily on its digital channels to drive sales, support customer experience, and scale efficiently across domestic and international markets.



Responsibilities

Owning the end to end e-commerce operation across Shopify as the primary platform

Managing and supporting the back office and digital team

Overseeing technical, operational, and day to day e-commerce activities

Acting as the main point of contact for agencies and third party vendors

Representing the company on technical, operational, and integration related calls

Managing product additions, integrations, customer service escalations, and platform issues

Ensuring the team is aligned, productive, and clear on priorities

Running regular check ins and one on ones with direct reports

Coordinating with in person staff as it relates to e-commerce operations

Communicating clearly with company owners on progress, issues, and priorities

Getting hands on when needed to resolve issues or unblock the team



Platforms and Experience Required

Strong expertise in Shopify is required

Experience with Amazon is strongly preferred

Exposure to Walmart or eBay is a plus but not required

Comfort managing integrations, apps, and technical workflows

Experience working with agencies and external partners



Requirements



Education & Experience



Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business, E-commerce, or a related field is preferred

Minimum of 3 years of hands-on Shopify experience in a live e-commerce environment

Proven experience maintaining, optimizing, and troubleshooting Shopify stores

Experience managing or supporting marketplace platforms such as Amazon, Etsy, eBay and More

Background working in product-based or multi-channel e-commerce businesses

Strong understanding of end-to-end e-commerce operations and workflows

Comfortable working remotely and independently with minimal supervision

Able to manage day-to-day execution while overseeing team output and priorities

Ability to work fully during Eastern Standard Time business hours



Nice to Have Skills



Experience with additional marketplaces such as Walmart or other third-party platforms

Familiarity with e-commerce integrations, apps, and third-party tools

Basic understanding of e-commerce financials, including margins, pricing, and cost of goods

Experience coordinating with agencies or external vendors

Exposure to international e-commerce operations or cross-border selling

Comfortable supporting or overseeing digital marketing initiatives in partnership with specialists or agencies

Experience helping scale or integrate new brands or acquisitions into an existing e-commerce platform



Ideal Candidate Profile



Has managed a small to mid sized team (roughly 5–20 people)

Comes from a small business or growing company environment

Is comfortable wearing multiple hats

Can lead without being “too high level”

Is not afraid to get into the operational or technical details

Can grow with the company as we scale and potentially acquire other businesses



***Very important: Do take note that the applicant is required to share their updated CV with appropriate access. Applicants who are non compliant with this will be automatically ignored.***

title: Video Editor
description:
We are expanding the post-production team at DBN Production and need a dedicated editor who can take raw footage from our shoots and turn it into eye-catching production videos. The work ranges from polished deliverables for brands to punchy cuts destined for social, so agility and a fast-paced, dynamic style are essential.



Here’s what day-to-day looks like:

• Ingest, organise and back-up multi-camera footage.

• Craft tight narratives with energetic pacing, sharp cuts and on-beat transitions.

• Layer in motion graphics, simple VFX, colour grading and balanced audio.

• Export platform-optimised masters and quick social teasers.



We work mainly in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects; if you’re equally at home in DaVinci Resolve or similar, all the better. You’ll be collaborating closely with the directors and content team, so strong communication and the ability to turn around revisions quickly is vital.  



This is a full-time role based in Dubai with a monthly salary of AED 3,000–4,000. To move forward, send a link to past work that best shows your fast, energetic editing approach. No need for long proposals—your reel will do most of the talking.



For any questions you can reach Nina or Angelo directly at
(whatsapp only). Meanwhile, feel free to browse the kind of stories we tell:









Excited to see how your style can elevate our next project.

title: Website Developer
description:
I am seeking a skilled web developer/designer to build a modern, high-performance website for a coaching business. The site must be clean, professional, and easy to use for both clients and administrators, with a strong focus on online scheduling, service presentation, and lead conversion.



The website should operate similarly in structure, flow, and functionality to a reference website I will provide, while maintaining original design and branding tailored to my business.



?



Core Objectives

 • Present the coaching business professionally and credibly

 • Allow clients to easily view services, book sessions, and manage bookings

 • Reduce admin workload through automated scheduling and confirmations

 • Be scalable as the business grows (additional services, staff, locations, etc.)



?



Key Features & Functionality



1. Scheduling & Bookings

 • Integrated booking system (e.g. Calendly, Acuity, Setmore, or custom-built)

 • Clients can:

 • View availability

 • Book sessions (1-on-1, group, programs, PT sessions, etc.)

 • Receive automated
 confirmations and reminders

 • Admin can:

 • Manage availability

 • Block out times

 • Edit or cancel bookings



2. Services & Programs

 • Clear breakdown of coaching services offered

 • Ability to list:

 • Individual sessions

 • Packages / programs

 • School or club-based offerings

 • Option to add pricing (or “enquire” buttons where appropriate)



3. Lead Generation & Contact

 • Contact forms with enquiry routing

 • Call-to-action buttons (Book Now / Enquire / Free Consultation)

 • Integration with
 (Gmail, Outlook, or CRM if recommended)



4. Inspiration-Based Layout

 • Website structure, flow, and UX inspired by a reference site I will supply

 • Not a copy — but similar:

 • Navigation style

 • User journey

 • Booking flow

 • Open to developer input on best practices and improvements

title: Remote F&B Cost Controller
description:
Here's a professional job description for this position:



FOOD & BEVERAGE COST CONTROLLER

Location:  (Remote)

Reports To: Director of Finance / General Manager

Employment Type: Full-time

Industry: Hospitality / Food & Beverage



POSITION OVERVIEW

We are seeking an experienced Food & Beverage Cost Controller with a strong hospitality background to manage all aspects of F&B cost analysis, vendor sourcing, inventory control, and financial reporting. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience in food and beverage operations, preferably from a quality hotel or resort environment such as Hyatt, Raffles, or similar luxury hospitality brands.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Accounts Payable & Invoice Management



Enter and process all food and beverage invoices with accuracy and timeliness

Maintain organized records of all vendor transactions and payment schedules

Reconcile invoices against purchase orders and delivery receipts



Vendor Management & Strategic Sourcing



Research and identify competitive pricing by soliciting quotes from all approved vendors via

Source quality produce from US, Philippines, and other international markets

Negotiate pricing and terms with suppliers to optimize cost savings

Evaluate new vendor opportunities and maintain strong supplier relationships

Monitor market trends and recommend sourcing alternatives



Recipe Costing & Menu Analysis



Manage and maintain recipe costs in Accounting & Micros POS system

Update ingredient costs regularly based on current vendor pricing

Calculate and analyze menu item profitability

Provide recommendations for menu pricing adjustments based on cost analysis



Cost Analysis & Reporting



Produce monthly theoretical versus actual cost comparison reports for food and beverage

Identify and investigate variances between theoretical and actual costs

Analyze food and beverage cost percentages and prepare detailed variance reports

Generate actionable insights to reduce waste and improve profitability



Liquor Inventory & Control



Collaborate on liquor inventory management and control procedures

Analyze weekly bottle weighing data provided by local team

Prepare monthly liquor cost analysis and variance reports

Identify discrepancies and recommend corrective actions for inventory shrinkage



General



Support the finance team with ad hoc cost analysis and special projects

Ensure compliance with all accounting policies and procedures

Maintain confidentiality of all financial and proprietary information





QUALIFICATIONS & REQUIREMENTS

Required:



Education: Bachelor's degree in Accounting, Finance, Hospitality Management, or Culinary Arts

Experience: Minimum 3-5 years in food and beverage cost control, preferably in a hotel or resort setting

Industry Background: Experience with quality hospitality organizations (Hyatt, Raffles, Marriott, Four Seasons, or equivalent luxury brands strongly preferred)

Technical Skills:



Proficiency in Micros POS system (recipe costing module)

Advanced Microsoft Excel skills (pivot tables, VLOOKUP, formulas)

Strong accounting and bookkeeping knowledge

Experience with accounts payable systems







Highly Preferred:



Former chef or culinary professional with transition to cost control

Certified Public Accountant (CPA) or pursuing CPA certification

Experience in multi-unit food and beverage operations

Knowledge of international food sourcing and import/export processes



Skills & Competencies:



Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities

Excellent attention to detail and accuracy

Superior written and verbal communication skills in English

Ability to work independently with minimal supervision

Proactive mindset with ability to identify cost-saving opportunities

Strong organizational and time management skills

Proficiency in vendor negotiation and relationship management

Understanding of food and beverage operations, purchasing, and inventory management





WHAT WE OFFER



Competitive salary commensurate with experience

Remote work flexibility

Opportunity to work with an established hospitality operation

Professional growth and development opportunities

Collaborative team environment

title: DTP / Graphic Designer – Logo Cleanup & Print Ready Files
description:
Hi!



I’m looking for a detail-oriented DTP / graphic designer to help me prepare an existing logo for professional printing.



The logo design itself is already finished and approved.

This job is not about redesigning, but about technical refinement and delivering clean, print-ready files.



What needs to be done:

 • Correct very small alignment issues (the logo is slightly off by a few millimeters)

 • Make sure everything is perfectly straight and balanced

 • Prepare the logo in high-resolution, print-ready format



Deliverables required:

 • Vector file (AI / SVG)

 • Adobe Illustrator (.AI)

 • Photoshop (.PSD)

 • Properly layered files so I can adjust colors myself later

 • Clean, scalable files suitable for professional printing



Important:

 • This is a DTP / cleanup task, not a creative redesign

 • The logo should stay exactly the same visually, just technically perfected

 • Precision and attention to detail are very important



This role is a good fit if you:

 • Have experience with DTP and print preparation

 • Are comfortable working with Illustrator and Photoshop

 • Understand vector files, alignment, and print requirements

 • Enjoy clean, technical work



How to apply:

In the SUBJECT / TITLE of your application, start with:

DTP Logo Cleanup



In your message, please briefly answer:

 1. What experience do you have with DTP or print-ready files?

 2. Which tools do you usually work with (Illustrator, Photoshop, etc.)?

 3. Have you done logo cleanups or vector refinements before?



Payment can be discussed after reviewing your experience.

I’m looking for someone reliable and precise.



Thank you,

Florian

title: Fashion Brand Curator & Shopify Specialist (French-Inspired Women’s Fashion)
description:
About the Brand



Fashion Coquette is a French-inspired women’s fashion brand focused on effortless elegance, soft femininity, and modern confidence.

We curate chic, wearable pieces that look expensive without luxury prices, inspired by Parisian brands and modern minimalism.



This is not a generic dropshipping store.

This is a carefully curated brand where taste, restraint, and visual consistency matter.



The Role

We are looking for a fashion-minded Shopify specialist who can help execute and protect the Fashion Coquette brand vision.

This role goes beyond technical tasks.

You will be curating a wardrobe, not importing random products.

If you love women’s fashion, aesthetics, and clean design — you’ll thrive here.



Key Responsibilities

1. Product Curation (Core Responsibility)

Select women’s fashion products from Trendsi (U.S. warehouse only)

Approve or reject products based on brand guidelines



Ensure every item fits one of our collections:

Paris Weekend

Coquette Essentials

Minimal Luxe

Night Out in NYC

Vacation Chic



2. Shopify Product & Collection Management

Import products cleanly into Shopify

Organize products into collections and categories

Maintain consistent product titles and descriptions

Ensure product pages look premium and editorial



3. Brand & Visual Consistency

Review product images and reject off-brand visuals

Maintain a clean, minimalist, French-inspired aesthetic

Support homepage and collection layouts with the right products



This Job Is NOT For You If:

You import products just to fill a store

You prefer quantity over curation

You’ve only worked on cheap-looking dropshipping stores

You don’t care about fashion aesthetics



Required Skills & Qualities

Strong eye for women’s fashion & aesthetics

Shopify experience (products, collections, basic theme editing)



Ability to follow brand rules and exercise good judgment

Detail-oriented and organized

Comfortable working with visual guidelines and moodboards

Big Plus (but not required):

Background in fashion, styling, or visual merchandising

Experience with fashion suppliers (Trendsi is a plus)

Ability to write clean, elegant product titles

Work Setup

Remote



Part-time to start (with possibility to grow)

Long-term role for the right person



IMPORTANT: Test Task (Required to Apply)

To apply, please complete this short task:



From an online fashion supplier (example: Trendsi),

choose 3–5 women’s fashion items that you believe fit a French-inspired, feminine, minimalist brand.

Briefly explain why each item fits the brand and which collection it belongs to.

We are building a real brand and value taste and judgment as much as technical skills.

If you’re passionate about social media, love creating meaningful content, and want to work on a variety of exciting brands, we’d love to hear from you. Please send your CV and portfolio/examples of your work to

title: Social Media Content/Influencer Outreach (Hiring Immediately)
description:

If you’ve managed creators, run outreach, handled brands, or been a top performer in content or influencer roles -> this role is for you.



This is not a passive posting job or a “wait for replies” role.

This is a high-ownership growth role tied directly to brand reach and sales.



You will:

- Reach out to influencers daily

- Manage replies, follow-ups, and negotiations

- Push content live (not “waiting”)

- Own results end-to-end

We want people who are used to targets, accountability, and moving fast.

• Research and shortlist creators (IG, TikTok, YouTube)

• Do daily influencer outreach (DMs &
)

• Coordinate content briefs, posting timelines, and deliverables

• Work closely with the founder and growth team



This role is NOT

• A trainee role

• A “post and chill” social media job

• A creative-only role with no numbers

• A flexible, side-hustle position

• Understands metrics (replies, content output, CTR, conversions)

Experience with influencer management, brand outreach, UGC, or content ops is a major plus.



Details

title: UGC Creator Program Coordinator
description:
ABOUT THE ROLE



We're looking for a highly organized, detail-obsessed UGC Creator Program Coordinator to manage our creator program. You'll be the backbone of our creator operations - sourcing top talent, animating our community, and ensuring everything runs like clockwork. You'll report directly to one of the co-founders.

This role is perfect for someone who lives in Notion, speaks fluent English, and thrives on building systems that work.



WHAT YOU'LL DO



1. Sourcing & Recruitment



- Inbound: Continuously identify and recruit top-tier UGC creators to join our program

- Outbound: Actively promote our UGC creator program across platforms and manage application funnels

- Build and maintain application docs/pages

- Prepare and update creator contracts

- Own the complete onboarding process, making sure every creator completes each step on time and updating documentation accordingly



2. Community Management



- Animate and engage our creator community in chat channels

- Design and share challenges

- Be the go-to person for all creator questions, problems, and support needs



3. Operations & Compliance



- Monitor UGC creator output to ensure they're meeting quantity requirements

- Prepare invoices and manage creator payouts

- Keep all operational documentation pristine and up-to-date



4. Strategic Development



- Benchmark competitor and adjacent creator programs for inspiration

- Identify opportunities for continuous improvement

- Bring fresh ideas to evolve our program





YOU'RE A GREAT FIT IF YOU:



- Are very good at Notion & 
 - you're borderline obsessed with building beautiful, functional docs

- Are fluent in English and naturally communicate with Gen Z creators

- Are Type A and detail-oriented to a fault (in the best way)

- Love operations and get genuine satisfaction from making processes run smoothly

- Can juggle multiple priorities while keeping everything organized

- Are proactive and don't wait to be told what needs doing



NICE TO HAVE



- Previous experience managing UGC creator programs, affiliate networks or online communities

- Familiarity with creator economy platforms and tools

- You'r a content creator yourself



HOW TO APPLY

Fill out this form : 



Record a 2-3 minute Loom video introducing yourself.

- Who you are

- Your relevant experience (previous roles, companies you've worked with)

- Why you're interested in this role

- What makes you a great fit for managing a UGC creator program





Our Process:

1/ Video application (you submit)

2/ 30-min intro call

3/ 45-min live case study
